text: Needmore is a ghost town in Tallahatchie County, Mississippi, United States. Needmore was located on the west bank of the Tippo Bayou, approximately southwest of Charleston. The settlement had a post office, school, church and cemetery. The Needmore Cemetery is all that remains. ==References== Category:Former populated places in Tallahatchie County, Mississippi Category:Former populated places in Mississippi
title: Needmore, Mississippi
